cause.description:
We are group of Returned Peace Corps Volunteers who served in Kyrgyzstan and others who interested and or concerned about Kyrgyzstan.
1. Support Peace Corps in Kyrgyzstan
2. Desciminate information about Kyrgyzstan
3. Promote the third goal of Peace Corps
cause.mission: Support Peace Corps in Kyrgyzstan and provide information about Kyrgyzstan
cause.name: Friends of Kyrgyzstan
